changes: Added upgrade system to provide release notes in the web interface
Tested out possible linear pwm brightness fixes
System will check for upgrades on startup and will the lamp 3 times before installing
A new server has been setup to store and handle upgrades
Devices will not have the default hostname of lamp.local.  Instead, each device will have a unique host name which is exposed locaing using mDNS
System will send a heartbeat to the server to announce it's presence
A new centralisted system for administering devices on a network has been created which can be found at lampsetup.com
